subject: Re: Order #SSN1489
description_text:
Hi,
It is now the 2nd of June and I don't even have tracking yet??Can you please provide this ?
Thank you
RegardsJamie
    On Thursday 22 May 2025 at 04:40:12 pm ACST, General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com> wrote:  
 
 
Hello, sorry for the delay! During our ongoing testing, we found a small issue with the Pro X Ultra's control box, we have returned it all to the factory to fix it and expect to ship it out for you tomorrow or the day after. Thank you for your understanding, we will choose the fastest logistics for you and expect it to arrive for you around the 30th. Sincerely apologise!service@simsonn.com
 From: Jamie WilsonDate: 2025-05-22 11:40To: Simsonn ServiceSubject: Order #SSN1489When will this ship??? It should be shipped by now.Poor service. You won't even respond.
RegardsJamie Wilson

conversations.body_text:
Hi,
If you can't reply I would like a refund.
I will apply for a charge back from my bank if you don't reply or give a refund.
Thank you
RegardsJamie Wilson

Hi Jamie Wilson, We apologize for the delayed response due to sudden changes in our client staff. Your order has been shipped via Alibaba logistics. The tracking number is ALS01070226907, and you can track the shipment on 17track.
ID 为 54 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单54  
      主题: CANCEL Re: A shipment from order #SSN1489 is on the way  
      描述:  
 
         Just cancel this order. 
   
 I don't want it 
   
 CANCEL CANCEL CANCEL 
   
 I want a refund. 
   
 Terrible service from the start.

Hi,
Still hasn't arrived and is saying ALERT in tracking.
Please check what the issue is, thank you.
RegardsJamie Wilson

Hi Jamie Wilson,     Sorry, the address you provided is a P.O. Box address and the logistics provider is unable to send it, please provide a new address. We are sorry for not updating the logistics information for you in time, we will refund you $39 again as compensation, sincere apologies!

Too late. I have started a bank refund. 

Clearly the item hasn't been shipped due to the address problem. Which took almost 6 weeks to discover ??

Hi Jamie Wilson,    Sorry, we've been so busy lately that we didn't replenish our customer service team in time for someone to leave, resulting in these tracking issues not being done properly. We have already refunded you $39 and we can refund you another $50 as compensation, please provide us with your correct address. I'm sorry for the bad experience you had, sincerely apologize!

Hi,
As they have never been shipped, just refund the full amount please. ( less the $39). 
I have asked numerous times to cancel. But was told they have shipped, but they never did.
RegardsJamie Wilson

Hi Jamie Wilson,    Your parcel is already in our logistics partner's warehouse, it's us we ignored their notification about your wrong address not being able to ship the parcel, causing such a long delay for you. If you re-provide us with the correct address, we will deliver your parcel within 4 days and refund you $50 as compensation.

OK
Send to
Jamie WIlson397 Markaranka RdWaikerieSouth Australia 5330
Hi Jamie Wilson,    Thank you for your offer, we will contact the logistics provider to dispatch it for you as soon as possible!
